SetDisplaySlot.Description: Sets where the objective should display (BELOW_NAME, TAB_LIST, SIDEBAR)

SetNumberFormat.Description: Set the number format for the objective, if no value is specified it will default to its default style (extra styles: blank)

SetDisplayName.Description: Sets the name of the objective

GetDisplayName.Description: Gets the display name of the component

GetScore.Description: Gets the score that is attached to the Objective
